PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Physical Trapper - Exsanguinate for Clear & Seismic Single Target - How to Level
^xAF6025Hillock:^7
Stormblast Mines + Chance to Poison - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
^xAF6025Hailrake:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Frostblink + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70B^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^7
^xB97123Brutus:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFBB^7^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x3F6DB3^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms -^x3F6DB3 ^x7070FFB^7^7
^xB97123Chamber of Sins (Act 2): ^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught - ^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7
Orb of Storms - ^x7070FFB^7
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)
^xAF6025Bandits: ^7
^xD02090Help Alira^7^7^x7070FF ^7- Change to 2 Passives Later^7 (Vendor 20 Regret Orbs + Onyx Amulet)
^xB97123Vaal Oversoul:^7
Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - ^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7
Orb of Storms + Onslaught + Elemental Focus - ^x7070FFBB^7^x3F6DB3^x70FF70G^7^x70FF70
^7Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
Wave of Conviction - ^x7070FFB^7 (Use this for Single Target)
^xAF6025^xE05030VERY IMPORTANT TO DO YOUR WAND CRAFT AT THIS POINT - HERE'S THE RECIPE:^7^7 1 Orb of Alteration 1 Magic Wand 1 RARE Topaz Ring
^xB97123Maramoa (Act 3):^7
Conductivity - ^x7070FFB^7 (Add it anywhere in your gear - used for Single Target)
^xB97123Crystal Veins Waypoint - Act 4: ^7
^xE05030THIS IS WHEN YOU WANT TO DO YOUR FIRST LAB & ALSO WHERE YOU WILL BE BECOMING AN ACTUAL TRAPPER!
^xD02090Ascendancy Order: Pyromaniac -> Perfect Crime -> Chain Reaction -> Born in the Shadows
^7Lightning Trap (Act 1) + Multiple Traps (Act 1) + Elemental Focus (or Trap & Mine Damage) - ^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7 ^x7070FFB^7 or ^x7070FF^x70FF70G^7^7
^7Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7^x7070FF
^7Seismic Trap + Lightning Spire Trap + Trap & Mine Damage - ^7^x70FF70GG^7^x7070FFB^7 (Throw them down for Single Target - All 3)
^7Flamethrowing Trap + Elemental Focus - ^x70FF70G^7^x7070FFB^7 (Throw them down for Single Target - All 3) ^7 ^7Bear Trap^7 - ^x70FF70G^7
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
Conductivity - ^x7070FFB^7 (Add it anywhere in your gear - used for Single Target)
^xB97123Clear Strand in Act 6 (Unlock ALL Gems):^7
Exsanguinate (Buy it in Act 1) + Trap Support + Cluster Traps + Chain - ^xE05030R^7^x70FF70GGG^7
Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (keep this lvl 6) - ^x7070FFBB^7^x7070FF
^7Seismic Trap - Advanced Traps - Trap & Mine Damage - Increased Critical Strikes^7 - ^x70FF70GGG^7^x7070FFB^7
Lightning Spire Trap + Flamethrowing Trap + Advanced Trap + Trap & Mine Damage - ^x70FF70GGG^7^x7070FFB^7
Bear Trap^7 - ^x70FF70G^7
Skitterbots - ^x7070FFB^7
Herald of Thunder - ^x7070FFB^7 (Drop this if you are having mana issues)^7
Conductivity - ^x7070FFB^7 (Add it anywhere in your gear - used for Single Target)
^xB97123Around Blood Aqueducts (When you have the Masteries for Mana Reservation Efficiency): ^7
Grace - ^x70FF70G^7
^xD02090THIS IS WHAT YOU WILL RUN ALL THE WAY UP TO AROUND LVL 75 WHEN YOU SWAP TO PHYSICAL!^7
